content: That's really helpful, thanks! I'll definitely share those facts with my book club. By the way, I also recently volunteered at the Children's Museum for their "Art Day" event, where local artists set up stations for kids to create their own art pieces. I helped supervise the painting station and assisted the kids with their masterpieces. It was a lot of fun, and I got to take home one of the paintings created by a 6-year-old girl, which now hangs in my living room.
